metadata.name: "Raising the Ukrainian Flag over Kyiv"
metadata.description:
Inspired by the Soviet soldier, Ukrainian-born Photographer, Yevgeny Khaldei
 - Raising a Flag over the Reichstag - c. 1945

He is best known for his World War II photograph of a Soviet soldier raising a flag over the Reichstag in Berlin, capital of the vanquished Nazi Germany, at the close of the war

This is a Satirical creative argument on the original Artwork. Which speaks volumes in the current status of the Sociopolitical atmosphere. 

Yevgeny Khaldei a Jewish/Ukrainian serving with the Soviet Union to take a True picture of their Idealogical Freedom from the Nazis. 

In retrospect to current Russian/Ukrainian Conflict, speaks on the True Ideas of Humanity and how we share this Beautiful Planet with one another as neighbours. 

Futhermore, the necessity of Peaceful Intentions and Intellectual conversation. 

Created with Disco Diffusion v.5 by @Somnai_dreams @RiversHaveWings @gandamu_ml 

#aiartcommunity #aiartist #Ukraine #StandWithUkraineÔ∏è #UkraineUnderAttack #History #Kyiv #ai
